name: home_team_last_10_matches
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool football_prediction.
Tool description: The Football Prediction API provides predictions for upcoming football matches, average bookie odds, results for past matches and prediction performance statistics for past results.
API description: Fetches the statistics and list of the last 10 matches played by the home team for a given team ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the home team for which to fetch the last 10 matches.
